Posts.Content: aprilmommy0205 wrote: I had my biopsy on Wed. night.  I was instructed not to shower for 24 hours.  I showered Fri. morning.  When I removed the gauze, I didn't notice any bruising.  I just went to take a shower and was pretty startled by the very large bruise I have.  It is very dark.  Is this normal?  I looked on my care instructions and they don't mention anything about it.  I am prone to bruising easily.
